definition: Unified dimensional analysis of psychological archetypes, consciousness structures, and personality type systems - mapping universal patterns across scales from individual to collective, with complete socionics integration and 4D geometric duality

dimensional_progression.name: Point
dimensional_progression.psychological_function: Discrete moment of awareness, singular choice, identity anchor

dimensional_progression.name: Line
dimensional_progression.psychological_function: Intentional direction, causal chain, life narrative

dimensional_progression.name: Plane
dimensional_progression.psychological_function: Relationship matrix, behavioral patterns, social roles

dimensional_progression.name: Volume
dimensional_progression.psychological_function: Complete personality system, identity container, psychological ownership

dimensional_progression.name: Connectivity
dimensional_progression.psychological_function: Life history integration, meta-awareness, conscious coordination

dimensional_progression.name: Identity
dimensional_progression.psychological_function: Unified consciousness, collective field, transcendent identity

center_point.role: Core organizing principle of consciousness, central question that drives all inquiry

inner_circle.layer: Personal core - individual identity and basic motivations

archetypes.name: Истина (Truth)
archetypes.role: Seeks objective reality beyond personal interpretation

middle_circle.layer: Social interface - interaction with surrounding world

archetypes.name: Мудрость (Wisdom)
archetypes.role: Synthesizes all experience into coherent understanding

archetypes.name: Структура (Structure)
archetypes.role: Creates stable frameworks for collective knowledge

archetypes.name: Единство (Unity)
archetypes.role: Perceives underlying oneness of all phenomena

outer_circle.layer: Cosmic connection - link to collective and transcendent principles

archetypal_dynamics.integration_sequence: Inner → Middle → Outer archetypal integration over lifetime
archetypal_dynamics.tension_management: Balancing opposing forces rather than choosing sides
archetypal_dynamics.individuation_process: Conscious integration of shadow and persona archetypes
archetypal_dynamics.collective_service: Personal archetypal work serves collective psychological evolution

socionics_typology.principle: 16 psychological types = 16 4D geometric structures forming 8 sacred dual pairs across 4 quadras

types.name: Don Quixote
types.title: Innovator / Tutor
types.psychological_function: Possibility generation, innovation, connecting disparate ideas

types.name: Robespierre
types.title: Analyst / Critic
types.psychological_function: Structural analysis, logical systems, categorical thinking

dual_pairs.principle: Infinity contained in perfect form (continuous ↔ discrete)

types.name: Maxim Gorky
types.title: Inspector / Guardian
types.psychological_function: Order maintenance, rule enforcement, structural integrity

dual_pairs.principle: Harmonious law on rigid foundation (complexity ↔ simplicity)
Simplest action piercing all planes of time

types.name: Balzac
types.title: Critic / Strategist
types.psychological_function: Seeing essence through form, strategic pessimism, deep analysis

types.name: Jack London
types.title: Entrepreneur / Pioneer
types.psychological_function: Goal achievement, efficiency optimization, resource mastery

types.name: Dreiser
types.title: Guardian / Keeper
types.psychological_function: Value preservation, moral judgment, relationship guarding

dual_pairs.principle: Duocylinder snakes winding around tesseract axis (flow ↔ structure)
Self-sufficient system in protected container (efficiency ↔ preservation)

types.name: Gabin
types.title: Master / Craftsman
types.psychological_function: Precision work, technical mastery, sensory expertise

types.name: Stirlitz
types.title: Administrator / Manager
types.psychological_function: Direct management, practical organization, efficient execution

dual_pairs.principle: All-encompassing understanding → point of action (expansion ↔ focus)
Direct structure reflects soul's depth (rigidity ↔ flexibility)

Ne.name: Extraverted Intuition
Ne.essence: Connecting disparate ideas, exploring multiple possibilities

Ni.name: Introverted Intuition
Ni.essence: Seeing patterns across time, intuiting convergent future

duality.description: Perfect psychological complementarity - each partner's strengths cover the other's weaknesses
duality.geometry: Dual 4D structures with inverted vertex/cell counts or complementary topologies
duality.function_mechanism: Dominant ↔ PoLR, Auxiliary ↔ Vulnerable, Creative ↔ Role, Vulnerable ↔ Creative

activation.function_mechanism: Dominant ↔ Creative, similar but different approaches

mirror.description: Similar worldview, different methods - helpful reflection

identity.description: Same type - perfect understanding but no complementarity

conflict.description: Opposing values and approaches - requires conscious work

lookalike.description: Appear similar externally but fundamentally different

developmental_trajectory.life_trajectory: Linear progression through increasing psychological complexity and dimensional awareness

geometric_duality_principles.600_120_cell: Inversion: 600 cells/120 vertices ↔ 120 cells/600 vertices (complexity ↔ harmony)
geometric_duality_principles.spherecyl_duocone: Expansion/focus: all directions ↔ two points (broad ↔ precise)

integration_with_cfo.principle: Psychological archetypes and personality types are dimensional projections of consciousness field - each emphasizing specific planes and operations. 16 types = 16 4D geometric structures forming 8 sacred dual artifacts.
integration_with_cfo.mechanism: Type = cognitive bias toward certain dimensional operations. Archetype = energy pattern at specific dimensional level. Development = integration across dimensions. Duality = geometric complementarity creating sacred tools.
integration_with_cfo.goal: Transform unconscious type patterns into conscious archetypal mastery, enabling flexible access to all dimensions as needed. Find and honor dual partnerships.
integration_with_cfo.coherence_optimization: Understanding one's archetypal-typological structure allows working with natural strengths while consciously developing integration. Dual pairs create coherence neither could achieve alone.
integration_with_cfo.sacred_geometry: Each type corresponds to specific 4D structure. Dual pairs have complementary geometries. 8 artifacts represent optimal modes of human collaboration.

system_coherence_metrics.archetypal_balance: Degree of harmony between opposing archetypal forces
system_coherence_metrics.function_development: How well all cognitive functions are accessible
system_coherence_metrics.dimensional_integration: Completeness of integration across consciousness levels
system_coherence_metrics.type_flexibility: Ability to access non-preferred functions when needed
system_coherence_metrics.dual_recognition: Awareness and honoring of complementary partnerships
system_coherence_metrics.quadra_contribution: How well one's quadra serves collective needs
system_coherence_metrics.collective_alignment: How individual development serves larger evolutionary patterns
system_coherence_metrics.geometric_coherence: Alignment between psychological patterns and 4D structures

notes.socionics_vs_mbti: Socionics is more precise than MBTI. Same 4-letter codes refer to DIFFERENT types due to J/P flip for introverts. This system uses Socionics.
notes.disclaimer: Typologies are heuristic models for understanding cognitive patterns, not deterministic labels. Archetypes are universal energies, not fixed identities. Both frameworks serve psychological development and self-understanding.
notes.integration_insight: Archetypes provide vertical depth (dimensional layers), types provide horizontal diversity (cognitive variations). Together they map complete psychological territory.
notes.development_key: Knowing your type shows starting point and natural strengths. Archetypal work shows growth path. Dimensional awareness shows ultimate integration goal. Dual partnerships accelerate development.
notes.sacred_artifacts: 8 dual pairs = 8 sacred tools = 8 optimal modes of human collaboration, each with distinct 4D geometric signature.
notes.geometric_principle: Psychological duality reflects geometric duality. 600-cell ↔ 120-cell = Ne-Ti ↔ Si-Fe. Form follows function.

version_notes: Merged personality_types.json and archetypes-4d-figures-duals.json into unified comprehensive framework. Added complete Socionics with 16 types, 4 quadras, 8 dual pairs, 14 intertype relations, age-based development, and 4D geometric structures.
